channel.title: Donator Island
channel.description: Is there a way i can make a command like ::dc donator cave and only donators can teleport there? i have tried to make myself and cant lol or a portal that only donators can take?

item.title: Donator Island
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

I’m not sure if you still want help, but do what he said apart from his command.
Instead, use the following command:

if (command.startsWith("donatorzone")) { donatorcave(); }

Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Island
item.dc:creator: @beavercalk beavercalk
item.description:
@beavercalk wrote:

wtf it gives me 1 error for the “donator” can i do any other because i already have a command for donator

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Island
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

beavercalk:

k tell me where to add all that rofl

Ok add this under
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
in client.java

public boolean donatorcave() { if (donator >=1) { toX = 2290; toY = 3330; sM("Thanks for donating to our server!"); } else { sM("You are currently not a donator!"); } return false; }

add that

then

add this under
private void customCommand(String command) {

if(command.startswith(“donator”)) {
donatorcave();
}

Read full topic
